snippet.title: New Cycle Ingame Trailer
snippet.description:
"New Cycle" has begun its publishing life on Steam.

Steam page here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2198510?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=none&utm_campaign=en_short_trailer&utm_id=en_short_trailer

Discord community here:
https://discord.gg/nKd7Q4B37Z

⦁ ABOUT NEW CYCLE
Build a new civilization out of the chaos of an apocalyptic solar flare as you grow your House from a lone shelter to an industrial metropolis. Take on the burden of preserving life itself and help your people realize their aim: "A future beyond survival." Lead the world of New Cycle.

City Building, Colony Survival, Management game. Q1 2023
